=head1 tagpuller

tagpuller - Application for extracting ID3 tags from files.

=head1 SYNOPSIS

  tagpuller [ directory ] ...

=head1 DESCRIPTION

Application for extracting ID3 tags from files into new files. New files will be named as the old files except that the mp3 extention will be changed to ".tag".

=head1 SEE ALSO

libID3(3), http://tangent.org/

=head1 AUTHOR

Brian Aker, E<lt>brian@tangent.orgE<gt>

=cut
